FuncDef: The display mpls te leaf-list command displays information about all leaf lists.
CLIs: display mpls te leaf-list [ [ name ] <leaf-list-name> ] [ verbose ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about a specific leaf list.
-

Specifies the name of a leaf list.
The name is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. The name cannot start with an underscore (_) and when quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Displays detailed information about leaf lists.
-

Examples: List of P2MP tunnels using this leaf-list:
Number of P2MP tunnels using this leaf-list: 0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view detailed information about all leaf lists, run the display mpls te leaf-list command. The command output includes the addresses of and explicit paths to the leaf nodes and whether a leaf list is used by a tunnel. If the leaf-list-name parameter is not specified, the display mpls te leaf-list command displays information about all leaf lists configured on an ingress.
